attributes.action: Remove fuel tax in light of recent fuel increases therefore lessening the need for pensioners and the disabled to have to decide whether to " Heat or eat"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a disabled fifty four year old woman my basic heating bills have doubled in the last 18 months, I get no yearly heating grant, I eat once a day, don't drink smoke or run a car with these latest fuel increases I will not be able to eat every day!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
